params.unstakeDelaySec: - The unstake delay for this paymaster. Can only be increased.

constructor.details: Sets up the owner, entry point address, and backend signer for signature validation

params._backendSigner: The address authorized to sign paymaster operations
params._entryPoint: The address of the EntryPoint contract

execute(address,uint256,bytes).custom:error: ChatterPayPaymaster__OnlyOwner if caller is not ownerChatterPayPaymaster__ExecutionFailed if the call fails
execute(address,uint256,bytes).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.data: The calldata for the function to execute
params.value: The ETH value to send with the call

postOp(uint8,bytes,uint256).details: This function is marked as view since it only verifies that the caller is the EntryPoint.

validatePaymasterUserOp((address,uint256.custom:error: ChatterPayPaymaster__OnlyEntryPoint if caller is not EntryPointChatterPayPaymaster__InvalidDataLength if paymasterAndData is malformedChatterPayPaymaster__InvalidSignature if signature is invalidChatterPayPaymaster__InvalidChainId if chain ID doesn't match
validatePaymasterUserOp((address,uint256.details: Ensures the operation is properly signed and returns validationData with expiration time

params.userOp: The UserOperation struct containing operation details

returns.context: Additional context for the operation (empty in this case)
returns.validationData: A packed value containing validation status and expiration time

withdraw().custom:error: ChatterPayPaymaster__OnlyOwner if caller is not owner
withdraw().details: Transfers the entire balance to the contract owner

params.withdrawAddress: - The address to send withdrawn value.
the address to send withdrawn value.

addStake(uint32).notice: Add stake for this paymaster. This method can also carry eth value to add to the current stake.

execute(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Executes a low-level call to a specified address

getDeposit().notice: Return current paymaster's deposit on the entryPoint.

postOp(uint8,bytes,uint256).notice: Implements the postOp function required by IPaymaster.

unlockStake().notice: Unlock the stake, in order to withdraw it. The paymaster can't serve requests once unlocked, until it calls addStake again

validatePaymasterUserOp((address,uint256.notice: Validates a UserOperation for the Paymaster

withdraw().notice: Withdraws all ETH from the contract

withdrawStake(address).notice: Withdraw the entire paymaster's stake. stake must be unlocked first (and then wait for the unstakeDelay to be over)

documentation.text: Return current paymaster's deposit on the entryPoint.

@notice Allows the contract to receive ETH payments
 @dev Implements the receive function to accept ETH transfers

@notice Implements the postOp function required by IPaymaster.
 @dev This function is marked as view since it only verifies that the caller is the EntryPoint.

Unlock the stake, in order to withdraw it.
 The paymaster can't serve requests once unlocked, until it calls addStake again
